entry.title: From Fire by Fire
entry.summary:
Author: guinever

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,886Chapters: 11/17Kudos: 157

Summary: “Merlin. Even if you’re … even if you’re right, it doesn’t matter. It’s too late. He’s going to kill me. And I—listen to me, you idiot. I don’t want you to watch. And I don’t want you to be next.” orAfter confronting Morgause's vision of his mother, Arthur rides for Camelot, intending to make his father pay for his hypocrisy. He falls short of luck, for the King has fallen back on the counsel of his faithful Witchfinder, Aredian, who is convinced that Arthur is not Arthur, the crown prince, but a changeling, bound to Morgause's will and let loose upon Camelot to usurp Uther of his crown.As Arthur is dragged away to the dungeons, sentenced to a death by fire, Merlin must race against time to change the course of events which seem to spell out Arthur's demise. Time is scarce, however, and for all intents and purposes, it might be too late already.

entry.title: wherever i go, you bring me home
entry.summary:
Author: beepbeepyeah

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,942Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 12

Summary: Merlin returns to the spot where Arthur died every year on the anniversary of his death to drink his pain away. His excessive drinking usually results in a vivid hallucination of Arthur. This year, the hallucination of Arthur is more real than past years, causing his heart to break even more. But what Merlin doesn't know is that finally, after centuries of waiting, Arthur truly has returned.

entry.title: Jenny Grinteeth
entry.summary:
Author: Ginkgo_Biloba_Baggins

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,556Chapters: 1/10Kudos: 4

Summary: “Never wander alone, my darling, or Jenny Grinteeth will get you,” Hunith used to say. “Or if you forget, make sure you say the rhyme - that wards her off.” Jenny Grinteeth leave me be, my mother loves me, leave me be. Jenny Grinteeth is a game they play. But as Merlin is sucked into life at Camelot, he wanders alone more than ever. He is surrounded by people, but he doubts they love him; they can’t really even know him. The loneliness becomes so routine, he forgets his mother’s warnings and the funny, little rhymes, which might otherwise have saved his life.

entry.title: Of Legends and (Rugby) Kings
entry.summary:
Author: grlnxtdr29

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,219Chapters: 15/35Kudos: 33

Summary: The problem with Legends is that, over time, they are altered, misremembered, or forgotten all together. But some Legends are so great, they must be relived, again and again, until they get it right.Nick dreams only of being the Rugby King of Truham Grammar. Beyond that, he has no idea what he wants to do with his future. Until he meets a boy with curly hair, blue eyes, and dimples.Charlie dreams of Dragons, and Magick, of brave Knights, and a quest set before him, to bring back the olde ways, and set right the Legend that has been retold thousands of times. This time, he vows to set the record straight (Or not so straight.)Who knew their Destinies would collide?

entry.title: Some and Now None of You
entry.summary:
Author: Isthisusernameavailableornot

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 78,252Chapters: 25/?Kudos: 596

Summary: "Let him think I hate him. If that’ll stop him from risking his neck for me over and over again, then it’s a sacrifice I don’t have to think twice about." — Arthur finds out Merlin has magic. He also finds out how often Merlin risked his life for him and so, he does the only thing he can think of to protect him: banishment. Hurt and angry, Merlin leaves and swears to not look back. But, when two years pass and Morgana shows up at Merlin’s door, urging him to fill Gaius’ position as Court Physician, Merlin agrees. He really doesn’t know why, but Arthur is sure Merlin would do just about anything to get on his nerves. Unprepared for the shock of seeing Merlin back in the castle, Arthur is forced to speed along his plans to lift the ban on magic. But between stubborn councilors, a mysterious plague, a still angry Merlin, and Morgana being Morgana, Arthur is fairly certain he’ll lose his mind before the first year of his reign even ends.

entry.title: Void Noir
entry.summary:
Author: tallyquark

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,869Chapters: 4/11Kudos: 121

Summary: Agravaine's treason has been revealed at last. But this is only the beginning for Arthur Pendragon, for forces he can't hope to understand conspire to take the throne, and he won't be able to defend it alone.Merlin Emrys has left Camelot behind him. Or so he thinks. When faced with the hardest decision in his life, he'll have to decide what is most important to him.--Merthur EndgameCanon-Divergence
